column3: was a little too rare in places
column4: but delicious none the less. The sides are nothing to write home about
column5: but good. We had the shrimp de jonghe for an appetizer
column6: and the shrimp were delicious. It also came with Texas toast which I could make a whole meal out of. Service was fantastic
column7: although we had to ask for bread a few times before getting it.
